text: go your school website see the modules for your course
ask lecturers which are the reference texts for your modules
gob-ok.ccor libgen to find the books
when you do your tutorial  don't just rely on lecture notes
make use of the reference texts also
not every single person in a group aims for an A
so if you want an A  you have to make sure all the work is A standard
get fully acquainted with google scholar  pubmed  and whatever other search engines your sch subscribes to
learn to google for research papers using relevant keywords
